name: Logo Layout
description:
Optically scale and distribute logos in a grid. The algorithm takes into account the proportions of each logo so they all look great together in a grid â€” no matter how tall, wide, small, or large each logo may originally be. Create massive logo grids without wanting to quit design.


How it works:

  1. Select two or more objects
  2. Choose an alignment option
  3. Set a grid gap
  4. Choose the number of rows you'd like
  5. Click "Apply Layout" and sit back as Logo Layout does the rest
  6. Rearrange a few logos by hand if you'd prefer a different order. Run the plugin again to restore order and alignment.
